concept_not_found_desc: The concept you are looking for does not exist in our database with this categoy,Try searching in another category or add this concept  , if you want to add it click on Add Concept.
home_title: SEARCH FOR A CONCEPT TO SHOW IT'S
error_discreption: Sorry, the page you were looking for in this blog does not exist.
about_phrase1: Our app is designed to help users easily translate text from one language to another. With a simple and intuitive interface, our app makes it easy for users to communicate with others who speak different languages.We aim to open the door to global business by giving everybody access to the content they need in the language they speak.
support: Support for three languages for now : English , Hebrow , Arabic
instant: Instant translation of text and phrases
ability_to: Ability to save and organize favorite translations
exit_game_desc: Press leave to exit the game
not_enough_concepts_toast: There are probably not enough concepts in your category, try changing the category in the settings, or change the default category in your personal profile
description1: in this game you will receive a definition and you have to choose the concept name for this definiton
